content:
Is there a canonical way to extract the relevant automatically generated casesOn function once I have an InductiveVal?

For example, Or automatically generates Or.casesOn, and I want to find this function given Or. Conversely it would be helpful if there is a way to tell if a casesOn function is derived from an induct.
if you like you can also use src#Lean.mkCasesOnName which does this for you
Leni Aniva has marked this topic as resolved.
